entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taber

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
